description: This Dart source file defines a localization helper class 'L10n' for a Flutter application. It provides localized strings for supported languages ('en' and 'hi') and includes methods for retrieving translated messages based on the current locale.

classes.name: L10n
classes.description: A class providing localization mappings and helper methods for translation in a Flutter application. It manages supported languages and provides functions to retrieve localized strings based on the current context.

methods.name: t
methods.description: Returns the localized string for a given key based on the current language setting.

methods.name: tn
methods.description: Returns a formatted localized string with parameters for pluralization or variable substitution.

methods.name: supportedLocales
methods.description: Returns a list of supported locales, currently English and Hindi.
